author: Saskia Salak
text: 'Donâ€™t order through Ubereats. Our order was missing half the items and damaged. When we called the restaurant to inquire about the missing food they informed us there was nothing they could do to address the issues since we hadnâ€™t used their platform. Pretty terrible customer service.'

author: Rick Titone
text: 'Cozy place with good sandwiches and friendly service.'

author: N Busch
text: 'Had good first order but following orders were disappointing. When I called with an issue
column5: was passed to three different people who were not particularly helpful. They have an extensive menu and some things are tasty but it is hit or miss.'

author: Nicole Blank
text: "I really want to like this place. When they get our breakfast orders correct
column5: the food can be well prepared and delicious. Unfortunately
column6: our orders are wrong 50% of the time. Bacon
column7: Egg and Cheese - arrives repeatedly with no bacon. Ask for avocado on a sandwich
column8: get charged a buck for the avocado
column9: but receive none.\n\nThe issues happen on phone orders and in person orders
column10: and it is so frustrating. After a couple years of this
column11: I've finally decided to never go here again. It's just not worth it for the major mistakes which keep happening. I'd rather have a worse tasting sandwich from somewhere else with all of the correct ingredients."

text: 'Love this place! Itâ€™s on my way to work and I make sure to stop by for the iced coffee and the great sandwiches.'

text: 'Great spicy avocado toast and ice coffee.'

text: 'Staff was very nice and polite. The outdoor seating was cozy. Mozzarella

author: k j
text: 'The worst restaurant in the world how do you not put utensils in the bag with a breakfast order. I called the restaurant to speak to the manager the lady lies and says the manager is not in and tells me it says no disposable items in the bag .... like thatâ€™s not even an option... I will never order from them again not even napkins were put in the bag ....also there was hair in what they gave us as a fruit cup... disgusting ... do not eat from this restaurant. License and inspection should close this place completely down to check what else is on this restaurantâ€™s food. $60.00 order down the drain.'
